column4: I need to burn an iso image which is about 702mb but it says: Please replace the disc in the drive with a blank disc, with at least 702 MiB free. I,m using 700mb blank cd-r
normaly this should work even if the cd is only 700
is there other good burning software that I can use?
gnomebaker
thanks
you can enable it in /etc/bash.bashrc
look for the comment in that file that says "# enable bash completion in interactive shells"
which option in /etc/bash.bashrc enables the tab auto compelate?
sorry, didnt see that last line of yours
how do I reload /etc/bash.bashrc
you can source it, or log out and in
thanks a lot its working now
you're welcome :)
of course
or streamtuner with xmms, or amarok, or rhythmbox....
how do I use streamtuner with xmms to listen internet radio?
I think that is what I want
it does it by default - it's in the prefs
I think its not isntalled on my system, all I can find is xmms
that's right - you have to install streamtuner :)
just apt-get install streamtuner?
if you have the universe repository, yes, sudo apt-get install streamtuner
